title: Very problematic bug in champ select
body:
I just played some games with friends when, after we decided to play a normal game between our Odyssey rounds, our toplaner only had the Odyssey champs to pick. He tried typing something in the search bar and using the filter, but that didn't help.

Here's a screenshot: https://prnt.sc/ku1h3m

replies.body:
Hey Aory!

Do you have any more information on this bug? Is it still occurring for you/ have you seen it since?

He isn't really active atm, so we can't say much about it. We played 4 games of Odyssey together before the game. Also, we did swap the lobby to normal draft while everyone was inside, if this has anything to do with it. We'll try and simulate the exact same scenario tomorrow
This is a really odd bug - I suggest restarting the client before he queues up again (to any mode). Hopefully this doesn't occur again.
